 2011-04132011-03-10,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. John Z. Vertes ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY ** Supreme Court of Northwest Territories
PrecisResignation and granting of an annuity to the Hon. JOHN Z. VERTES, a judge of the Supreme Court of the Northwest Territories, effective July 1, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
